title.rendered: Riga International Airport ( RIX ) in Latvia

content.rendered:
Riga International Airport Latvia Address, Phone, IATA code, Website, Facilities available, Baggage contact

Address: SJSC RIGA International Airport
10/1 RIGA Airport
Marupe district
LV 1053
LATVIA

Phone :

Calls from Latvia: 1817
Calls from abroad: (+371) 29311817

ADMINISTRATION Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 135
TRAINING CENTER Telephone: 6 7207 434
FIRST AID Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 103, (+371) 2 9394 770
ARRIVAL SERVICE Telephone: 67 207 236
AIRPORT TRADE UNION Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 347
COMMUNICATIONS UNIT Telephone: (+371) 67207694, (+371) 29165007
HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 351
COMMERCIAL DEPARTMENT Telephone: +371 67668260
AVIATION SERVICES AND BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT DEPARTMENT Telephone: +(371) 6 7207 430
GROUND HANDLING DEPARTMENT Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 989
INFRASTRUCTURE MAINTENANCE AND DEVELOPMENT DEPARTMENT Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 062
QUALITY ASSURANCE DEPARTMENT Telephone: (+371) 6 7207 577
IT DEPARTAMENT Telephone: 6 7207 052
MARKETING UNIT Telephone: 6 7207 189

 

IATA Code: RIX

ICAO Code: EVRA

Website: https://www.riga-airport.com/en

Riga International Airport is the international airport of Riga, the capital of Latvia, and the largest airport in the Baltic states with direct flights to 76 destinations as of November 2019.
The airport was built in 1973 as an alternative to Spilve Airport, which had become outdated. It is a state-owned joint-stock company, with the owner of all shares being the government of Latvia.

Facilities at Riga International Airport ( RIX )

  • VIP Centre
  • RIX Club
  • Fast Track
  • Business Lounge
  • Shops and cafés
  • Visitor Centre
  • Prayer Room
  • Wi-FI and Phone
  • Shop&Collect
  • Conference Room Horizonts
  • Baggage Storage

List of Terminals in Riga International Airport ( RIX )

  • Arrivals
  • Departures

Sector B,C, E and gates are B1 to B12, C1 to C20

Baggage Services – Riga International Airport ( RIX )

If you lost or received your baggage in a damaged condition at the conveyor belt, please turn to Arrival Service Office that is located in the closed area of arrival before the border control.

Phone: (+371) 67 207 236
Email: arrival.service@riga-airport.com

Car Rental Services at Riga International Airport ( RIX )

AVISBudgetEuropcarSIXTenterprise rent a carHertzgreenmotionToprent
AVIS: Counter: E, Tel: +371 29 223 434, Website
 Budget: Counter: E, Tel: +371 29 223 434, Website
 Europcar: Counter: E, Tel : +371 29 222 637, Website
 SIXT: Counter: E, Tel : +371 67 207 121, Website
 enterprise rent a car: Counter: E, Tel : +371 29 338 899, Website
 Hertz: Counter: E, Tel : +371 67 224 223
 greenmotion: Counter: E, Tel : +371 27069670; +371 27012769, Email:info@greenmotion.lv
Toprent: Counter: C, Tel : +371 28 660 022, Email: info@toprent.lv Website

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Riga International Airport ( RIX ) Latvia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.
